description: The Romance of Tom and Tabby! Found tucked into a nondescript ledger dated 1894, these newspaper clippings where too cute to pass up. While the ledger itself contained nothing but unknown numerical listings, these newsprint photos survived. The newspaper they came from is also unknown, but from the advertising on the backside of each clipping it appears they are from the same time period of the 1890's.
